text: Jerome Hellman (September 4, 1928 â€“ May 26, 2021) was an American movie producer. He won the Academy Award for Best Picture for Midnight Cowboy (1969). His 1978 movie Coming Home was nominated for the same award. Hellman died on May 26, 2021, at the age of 92. ==References== Category:1928 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Movie producers from New York City
title: Jerome Hellman
